name: Pink Bunny HD
description:
A 3D HD game in 3rd person Adventure genre.
3D graphics, animation and sound FX.
The Pink Bunny wants to find hidden gem in each level but there are problems and enemy like wild turtles, rattlers, bats, fire ball, rolling stones,… . Of Course our bunny is smart and a good hunter.
The game consists of 3 worlds(you see the screenshots on top) and 4 levels in each world and 2 checkpoints an each level. There are 2 missions in each level to get a star for each.
